skills.name: WIPE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Deal Additional True Damage for every burn effect on the enemy.

skills.name: INCINERATE
desc: • Deal physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Remove All Beneficial Effects from all enemies before dealing damage.
• 25% Chance to Remove All Golden Effects from all enemies before dealing damage.
• 50% Chance to inflict Flame on enemies for the duration of battle.

skills.name: INFLAME
desc: • Inflicts up to 4 Physical Burns on random enemies every turn..
